verses.name: Nehemiah 4:3
verses.text: Now Tobiah the Ammonite was by him, and he said, Even that which they build, if a fox go up, he shall even break down their stone wall.

verses.name: Nehemiah 4:4
verses.text: Hear, O our God; for we are despised: and turn their reproach upon their own head, and give them for a prey in the land of captivity:

verses.name: Nehemiah 4:5
verses.text: And cover not their iniquity, and let not their sin be blotted out from before thee: for they have provoked thee to anger before the builders.
